item.title: Programming
item.description: Emacs Talks Emacs SF Meetup: [2020-01-29 Wed] A long form presentation about an interesting way to use literate programming in Emacs to do API documentation and testing, as well as a lot of my philosophy and work flow around using Emacs. Emacs Conf 2019 A shorter version of my Emacs SF meetup talk that’s more focused on literate programming, and doesn’t include any Emacs workflow discussion. https://media.emacsconf.org/2019/29.html

item.title: Personal
item.description: Outdoor Hiking For day hikes, look at satellite views first to determine if it’s a “road” hike For COVID-19 hikes you need to drive a couple hours away from the city to miss crowds Always plan a fallback hike Bring chairs/comfort items on day hikes North America Pinancles National Park. Good day trip Gold Bluffs beach campground Almost a 7 hour drive No reservations after sept 28 Zion national park traverse Graeagle is apparently a cool spot to go Hiking(from Jack Trout) Completed
